column2: User input should not be used in regular expressions without first being escaped, otherwise a malicious user may be able to inject an expression that could require exponential time on certain inputs.
column4: [["This"|"relative:///CWE-730/codeql_1.py:12:30:12:36"]] regular expression is constructed from a [["user-provided value"|"relative:///CWE-730/codeql_1.py:10:15:10:21"]] and executed by [["re.findall"|"relative:///CWE-730/codeql_1.py:12:19:12:51"]].
